entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:32 p.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 5:00 PM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
